item.title: blog 169
item.description: Lots of changes to condense the cafe JS, but you hopefully won't notice.... New staff photos were chosen for a couple dolls. A review of my ACBJD order was added to the information page. A beautiful rendition of Hina was added to art for me page! Like 50000 new annoying stamps were added to my about page.

item.title: blog 168
item.description: New blog post!! And some other things? I can't remember!

item.title: just cheby
item.description: Many photos added to Cheby's gallery. You'll have to email me to ask for the deep cuts. I wrote down my today's feelings for all my dolls in each of their profiles. A review for No. 6 anime is now up.

item.title: blog 167
item.description: Added a Vincent Valentine stamp!! Thanks, Lapin!!! 2 new Cheby photos in his gallery.

item.title: blog 166
item.description: Doll questionnaire added (in the staff/hat page), investigative journalism added, anime reviews for IMAS CG: U49 and Carnival Phantasm added.

item.title: blog 165 and more??
item.description: Doll wishlist rehaul. Sorry to disappoint. Lil apron boy added to anime reviews. After lots of effort, Rio's true name has been found and added to his profile. I double checked the spelling.

item.title: blog 164
item.description: only 9,980 more hours of drawing until I'm good at it!!!

item.title: arizona report
item.description: many photos!!! many hauls!!!

item.title: blog 161
item.description: forgot to update the RSS feed yesterday sorry!! New blog with lots of AI generated dollfoto

item.title: blog 162 ft. VLC player
item.description: Blog post, new doll publication page and profile page in cafe

item.title: blog 160
item.description: New blog and new photos of Sochi!!!! 2 new links added to the links page

item.title: blog 159
item.description: New blog, changes to doll wishlist, art added to for me and by me pages, Ace Attorney added to game reviews. Wow time for a nap!!

item.title: Long awaited Blog 158 appears in your mail box.
item.description: New blog !!!! Wow!!! Go visit the cafe to celebrate

item.title: just a few new photos
item.description: New photos in Cheby, LV, and group galleries. I hired a new barista, come see him on his shift on Sunday!

item.title: LUDOOOOOO
item.description: More Ludo?! Seriously?! Small additions to about me page and doll wishlist rearranged a bit.

item.title: Blog 157 up
item.description: Photos added to Cheby's, Rio's, Hina's galleries. Touhou panel added to archive. Ludo drawings added to art page.

item.title: GBC photos added
item.description: Photos added to GBC page and Cheby's gallery. Minor updates to links.

item.title: Blog 156
item.description: Resolution to the Luts order posted. New photo on the cafe bulletin board. Links added. Furuba review added. 2 more photos of Hina appeared!

item.title: Blog 155
item.description: Czech it out! Along with the new photos in the cafe gallery. I just changed all the dates for this feed and the microblog to be correctly formatted, so hopefully your picky RSS reader will validate it now.

item.title: I can't stop listening to Eiffel 65
item.description: A few dollfoto added (Rio, Cheby, Anya, Grassy). Also fixed the typo on how much I paid for the luts order #FLUBfree

item.title: Luts order arrived
item.description: A full page of photos of the stuff I paid too much for.

item.title: Blog 154 up!
item.description: Small modification to links in the cafe and I finally took Hina's kimono off, so her obi measurements are in the pattern page.

item.title: tiny updates
item.description: New images added to the bulletin board and memories of franchan added to the archive. Webring code has been updated and upgraded, but you shouldn't be able to tell.

item.title: bulletin board!!! also blog 153
item.description: It's so cool!!! go look at it!! it's linked in the blog post!!!

item.title: blog 152 up!
item.description: A blog post, updates to music reviews and other unlinked pages, and an update to the microblog script! Your RSS reader will thank me. The VolksUSA online FCS info page was updated with this month's options.

item.title: Liam's body is HERE!
item.description: Blog post, box opening, a couple new photos in the cafe gallery, Liam's broken gallery was fixed, a review of the WUG movie, and more?!

item.title: Just rambles
item.description: truly, nothing.

item.title: Blog 149
item.description: Cherry now has a variety of cups to serve you with! Try to collect them all! Images were reorganized and relinked so I probably broke everything.

item.title: Blog 148
item.description: Kinoko eye and HONEYBEAR are here!!! New blog post, new archived photos were added to the cafe gallery. There's some strange ones in there and all of them will transport you back to the year they were taken!

item.title: Blog 147
item.description: top hat cafe is now open! Please give a warm welcome to my doll barista, Cherry Limeade! Also new blog post about something or other. More terrible stamps have been added to my about page.

item.title: Blog 146
item.description: Just a new blog post! Updated Cheby, Hina, and Liam's galleries with photos from blog and microblog posts.

item.title: Blog 145
item.description: Rearranged and updated my wishlist.

item.title: Doll drama blog (boring)
item.description: Did you guys see KJ named their new baby unicorn POWDER? POWDER!!!

item.title: A very Xenoblade blog
item.description: Added a couple links to the links page too

item.title: Blog 142? Already??
item.description: Along with a blog post, I updated the doll memories page section "the end of money" with a wall of unimportant text.

item.title: Happy new year! It's 2023!
item.description: Blog 140 for the end of 2022 was uploaded, and blog 141 to start up 2023 was uploaded! SEPHIROTH

item.title: Christmas blog! now here! Uploaded now!
item.description: A new blog!! That's all!!

item.title: christmas eve's steve updates
item.description: Updated banner in doll links, added Beauty Green to doll issues, added Elfgutz and gutterface to doll memories.

item.title: Blog 138 is up
item.description: Galleries for Cheby, Hina, Kikipop, Praline, and Verona updated. Added another neocities doll owner to doll links.

item.title: Precious thing "marimo" appears!
item.description: Marimo added to precious things, short reviews for Hangry and Angry and AFI added. Don't bother reading the reviews, just go listen to them.

item.title: Shopping blogging
item.description: New blog post. Added links to 2 active English doll blogs. Doll memories has an in progress update so don't read that yet!

item.title: Doll plans blog post
item.description: New blog post. Added 2 (old) links to English doll websites that are STILL up!! Added a link to the update log in the footer. A few new photos were added to Liam and Verona's galleries.

item.title: Blog 135 is up!
item.description: Some minor changes to both links pages, but mostly a blog post.

item.title: It's hatterday!
item.description: New blog post, new RG Williams Now! button in the volks shrine, new questionnaire from JP doll twitter in doll memories, added LLT to recommended Chinese doll artists.

item.title: Happy Thanksgiving!
item.description: More new photos added to gameboy camera page, new 1/3rd family photo. More photos added to the galleries of Rio, Cheby, Liam, and Verona.

item.title: My Thoughts on Tokio Hotel's "Durch den Monsun"
item.description: I'm sure you were all sitting on pins and needles waiting for this. New photos added to gameboy camera page.

item.title: Hina is HERE!
item.description: Lots of unnoticable edits to the microblog script plus a github link to the code have been added.

item.title: fran hat's microblog debut!
item.description: I wrote a script! A review of Eiffel 65's Europop was added.

item.title: Blogging about pens. How boring!
item.description: Small edits made to doll profiles as well!

item.title: Blog 129?? Already?!
item.description: Small updates to the vinyl section of the doll guide about TinyFox and Dollbot. A few new photos of Liam and Verona have been added to their galleries. A couple new tweets were added to the bee.

item.title: Blog 128 4 u!
item.description: New blog detailing my lovely Halloween experience this year. Some links were moved around but nothing was added other than the button for zucchini.

item.title: Happy Halloween!
item.description: A new Halloween photo of Praline is now online! Added the link to the housefire doll thread in the doll memories page. Added a link to someone who knows more about these strange chinese doll recasts in doll opinions (they're not BJD!) Added massive sized dolls to the BJD guide.

item.title: blog 126
item.description: New photos of Verona and Cheby! Typo fix in the doll guide.

item.title: minor updates
item.description: Links page has been rehauled. About page was edited and now includes stamps. Favorites page has been unlinked from the nav bar. I'm very indecisive about this!

item.title: WOW! Blog 125 is here already? No way!!
item.description: Added another neocities BJD owner to the doll links list, added a few more people to the VIP doll links section. I added more doll issues and migrated a few from Doll Memories. In their place is an old memory of an Impldoll boy. A collection of stamps is now available! Link is at the bottom of my about page.

item.title: Japanese Kabedon is here!
item.description: Cheby finally got his own gallery page and a new profile pic. A few other dolls got updated pics as well! I started a list of issues with BJD companies that have occured. There are many more issues to add. Wish me luck!

item.title: Blog 123 is here!
item.description: I hope you didn't notice I missed 2 questions in the 2022 BJD Questionnaire! I definitely did not miss 55 and 77! I went through my doll blog log after discovering a small group of bloggers still left on Blogspot. I got a few more in there and moved around the ones that died in the last few months. RIP. I added a CSS file for this RSS feed. Why didn't anyone tell me RSS was awesome??

item.title: Worms have arrived!
item.description: I filled out the massive 100 question doll questionnaire! New photo added to the furby shrine, WIP page "worms" has been completed and added to shrines. Favorites page has been relinked again. Reviews for 2 APC albums added to music reviews. Added links to all my doll videos and the two questionnaires in doll memories.

item.title: Blog #122 has arrived
item.description: Hina NFT installed as a link to this RSS feed! Isn't she cute? Two Japanese Volks wiki links added to the Volks shrine along with Aridede's design sheet for SD16 Diamond. A furby collection page has been created.

item.title: Blog #121 has arrived!
item.description: New blog post, new RSS feed! Added a page on FCS SD-F-100 finalists and moved some stuff around for the VolksUSA online FCS ordering information into a new page.
